DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate contact lens fit , lens parameter , conjunctival stain sample subject various contact lens/solution combination .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Contact Lenses Conjunctival Staining Normal Patients
DOC.criteria: Successfully wear hydrogel and/or silicone hydrogel contact lenses ; Read , sign , date inform consent/HIPAA document ; Vision correctable 20/30 ( Snellen ) good eye distance habitual spectacle ; Willing able discontinue contact lens wear request study ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Evidence history ocular disease pathology ; One functional eye monofit lens ; Use concomitant topical ocular prescription overthecounter ocular medication ; History seasonal allergy significant ocular side effect may adverse impact contact lens wear ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
